# init(contentsOfURL:)

**Initializer**

Creates and returns a directions request object using the specified URL.

## Declaration

```swift
init(contentsOfURL url: URL)
```

```swift
init(contentsOf url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL provided to your app.

## Return Value

An initialized directions request object.

## Discussion

You should use the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDirections/Request/isDirectionsRequest(_:)] method to verify that the specified URL is of the correct format before calling this method to initialize the object.

## Creating a directions request object

- **isDirectionsRequest(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the specified URL contains a directions request.
